name: goTaxi
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: taxi fare
des: Alexa will help you to opt the best from ola and uber with cost / time concern. Alexa will make an estimate of both and as per your response it would suggest you the best option available. If user provide location with city or state , It could identify the exact location. User can make estimate of ride between any two geo locations.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
